artifacts.title: Decoupled Sensor-Shooter Integration for Flexible Engagements
artifacts.description:
*As* **UAE AFAD Mission Operators**, 

- *We need* AI-augmented tools that decouple sensors from shooters, enabling 'any sensor, any shooter' flexibility through Combat Cloud principles 
- *So that* we can dynamically allocate resources across multi-domain operations and respond to threats with optimal force-level TEWA.
artifacts.owner: Air Force and Air Defence Commander
artifacts.rationale: Enhances AFAD's decision superiority by enabling rapid, flexible threat neutralization in contested environments, aligning with joint force integration goals.

artifacts.title: Real-Time Multi-Domain Data Sharing and Allocation
artifacts.description:
*As* **UAE AFAD Enterprise Commanders**, 

- *We need* secure, resilient networks for real-time ISR data sharing across AFAD and coalition domains via Combat Cloud 
- *So that* we can achieve enterprise-wide resource allocation and maintain operational continuity during disruptions.
artifacts.rationale: Supports AFAD's organizational efficiency by integrating air, land, and cyber domains, reducing silos and enabling coalition interoperability under Supreme Command directives.

artifacts.title: AI/ML Integration for Predictive Threat Management
artifacts.description:
*As* **UAE AFAD Technical Specialists**, 

- *We need* modular AI/ML capabilities within Combat Cloud for predictive analytics, automated TEWA, and algorithm back-testing 
- *So that* we can proactively address emerging threats while ensuring technical compliance and modularity for future upgrades.
artifacts.rationale: Provides AFAD with technical tools for AI-driven enhancements, building on TRP1's DevOps platform to streamline deployment and maintain cybersecurity.
